suggest.doctrine/orm: The Symfony testcase in combination with the MysqlHelper needs Doctrine and the Doctrine-bundle
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-bundle: The Symfony testcase in combination with the MysqlHelper needs Doctrine and the Doctrine-bundle
suggest.jms/serializer: The XmlSerializerVisitor depends on jms-serializer and provides the ability to strip CDATA tags if possible. There is also a naming strategy for JMS in this package.
suggest.qafoolabs/profiler: Needed if you want to use the Qafoo-Profiler
